Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, kiwi1960 said:
> 
> 
> No it wasn't.... they had just done it all... they ended it on their terms....  
>   
>   
>   
>   
> 
> I seek legal redress, in the Galactic Court... I seek ownership of all hills past, present and future, in all dimensions, realities and all Galaxies..... I proclaim myself King of the Hill past, present and future... and if anyone wants to argue about that... then my lawyers will take you to the cleaners.
> 

![low-orbit-ion-cannon.jpg](https://www.johnvantine.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/low-orbit-ion-cannon.jpg)

They can't coordinate without the internet! My hill!

I use giant Nanorifle to destroy Ion cannon and make hill mine

![RFG_nanorifle.jpg](http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090702123329/redfaction/images/4/4d/RFG_nanorifle.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-05T07:29:47Z" title="08/05/2016 07:29  AM" data-short="7 yr">August 5, 2016</time> by TedwinKnockman66**

I create new hill in a place randomly determined by my ship's co outers snd turn all communications off,

My new hill.

I purchase your hill from a shady character at a local swap meet.

My hill.

I run up to the hill and punch the previous owner of off it. Then I plant a flag on it.

I also bribe [@kiwi1960](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/81697-kiwi1960/)'s lawyers so they won't disturb me.

My hill with a flag on it.

I ignore you all, and go live on a mountain, and make it flood, your hill is destroyed.... the flood waters recede and I claim the hill again....

As for where all the water came from.... I Noah guy..... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Hahahaha (out of likes ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")).

I unflood the world with Physics^TM(R)(C)SM

and claim the hill.

My hill.

I bombard legoclone09 with countless dead memes, making him leave the hill due to the high amount of stupidity on the hill.

My stupid hill!

Your hill is rendered not stupid by good music. Mainly because CTRL-V is almighty.

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Eotbo-DsPTo?feature=oembed" width="459"></iframe>

I launch a bold attack on the hill and destroy your radio, killing you in the process.

My awesome hill.

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YOWfmpCBYmo?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

\*revives\*

*ELIMINATED WILDCAT111*

My hill.

I also repair my radio, and

\*revives\*

My fleet of F4F WIldcats and F6F Hellcats dive-bomb the life out of your base and damage your radio permanently.

My hill

My lawyer presents you with a contract that states in the fine print that the hill is now mine. You sign the contract and I gain possession of the hill.

My hill!

I buy off your legal counsel and 51% of your stock, including the stock and dividends on the Hill. 

My hill!

I attack the hill again, taking the hill. But I am here to collect the hill and if you want it back [@quasarrgames](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/91692-quasarrgames/) you must pay me. Chocolate chip cookies and Toblerones accepted.

You are given an asteroid filled with Toblerone.

My hill.

I invite McDonald Trump to make Hill great again and Capture that hill.

Mine right now!

> 
> 
> 9 minutes ago, TedwinKnockman66 said:
> 
> 
> I invite McDonald Trump to make Hill great again and Capture that hill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Mine right now!
> 

I attack the hill and kill you and McDonald Trump.

My hill.
